Articles.Content:
**Welcome,**

Recently I've been playing around with KAX and have made a few designs so I decided to share them.

I would love to see what you guys have built so share this thread with your friends and try to get them started with KAX.

KAX --> [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76668-1-0-2-Kerbal-Aircraft-Expansion-%28KAX%29-v2-5-1?highlight=kerbal+Aircraft+Expansion](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76668-1-0-2-Kerbal-Aircraft-Expansion-%28KAX%29-v2-5-1?highlight=kerbal+Aircraft+Expansion)

The designs below are my "Twin Sister" designs. I designed them for my "faction", The Karsaw Pakt.

[http://imgur.com/a/qOfl0](http://imgur.com/a/qOfl0)

Post your designs below and I'll be posting more too!

How to embed imgur albums in a KSP forum post:

[imjur]five charachter string at the end of the url[/imjur] spelling imgur correctly, not as I've intentionally mis-spelled it so that it doesn't think that the explanation was an Imgur album.

Other than that, pretty good. You might want to try making a Corsair replica, those things are absolute beasts in the turns.
